title: Honor System Progress

embed.description: Honor in 2018 brings you updates based on your feedback. New checkpoints between levels let you track your progress and rewards get better as you level up.

body:
Should You Be Able To Track How Much Honor You Have in 2018?

Are you happy being surprised and honored when you level up, or you you feel you should be able to see and know when you are going to max it out?

replies.body:
I think the main reason we don't have a sort of experience bar for honor is simply that it's not meant to be a grindy system. Most feel that if there was a visual bar showing how close you were, players would be too focused on the grind and not just enjoying the game as normal!

With that being said, I feel like most of the purpose behind these checkpoints is just that. A way for you to see how far you've progressed towards the next rank.
i get what your saying, but its always nice to see your progress.
i'd like to know how much it takes for the rito monkeys to fix honor 0

Chat behavior like this is often what keeps people down. You can only blame yourself, not Rito. But in regards to the original post, I too would be curious to see an actual honor bar implemented. It would be useful to tell people where they currently stand, and when their honor progress is locked due to their behavior, and to be able to see when it's been reduced.
